<title level="2" right="Creature 18">[Hollow Hush](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2131)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 39</row>

**Perception** +33; [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13); (can't speak any language); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +32, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +35, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +35, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +33, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +31, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +31

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** +5

**Wis** +7

**Cha** +9
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 41 

**Fort** +31 

**Ref** +30 

**Will** +35 (+37 vs. [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects)

</row>

**HP** 355

**Resistances**
[mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) 20

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet; [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d10+14 slashing

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 42
- **2nd**
[Hideous Laughter](/Spells.aspx?ID=150)
- **3rd**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) (at will)
- **4th**
[Restoration](/Spells.aspx?ID=258)
- **7th**
[Crushing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=57) (×3), [Warp Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=369) (×3)
- **9th**
[Unfathomable Song](/Spells.aspx?ID=349)
- **Constant (4th)**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)

**Emotional Focus**   Hollow Hush can cast the following cleric domain spells as 9th-level occult innate spells at will without spending Focus Points: [_blind ambition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=404), [_captivating adoration_](/Spells.aspx?ID=405), and [_delusional pride_](/Spells.aspx?ID=414).

**Emotional Frenzy** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Hollow Hush casts up to three spells chosen from its at-will innate spells and its emotional focus spells.

**Feed on Emotion** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** Hollow Hush feeds on the emotional unrest of a single creature within 30 feet that's currently affected by an [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effect. The target must succeed at a DC 41 Will save or take 5d10 mental damage and be [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) for 1 round. If the target fails its saving throw, Hollow Hush regains the same number of Hit Points and Feed on Emotion does not cost Hollow Hush an action, allowing it to use another action this turn.

**Rapid Strikes** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Hollow Hush attempts three claw Strikes, each against a different target within reach. The multiple attack penalty applies to each attack, but increases only after all the attacks have been made.

**Spiral of Despair** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Trigger** A creature fails a saving throw to resist one of Hollow Hush's innate spells or emotional focus spells; **Effect** As Hollow Hush invades the triggering creature's mind and plants the seeds of negative emotions, it also strips away the target's feelings of hope or positivity. Hollow Hush can immediately end a single [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effect from which the triggering creature is benefiting.

</column>
name: Hollow Hush
